name: A Paltry Existence v0.2
description:
GAME JAM: A Paltry Existence is a weird little game set in Norrland, made as a part of the Artic game labs game jam May 2021

Complete a number of mundane daily tasks, making palt, skiing and getting the mail, surrounded by nature in quiet isolation

Press E to use, space to use the skiis

(Yes, we will make a full game)

Graphics

Clover Lloyd

Bill Magnusson
